title: Disguised Face
description:
A yellow face with big glasses, a large nose, thick eyebrows, and a mustache. Used to represent someone in disguise.

The features of this particular disguised face are taken from the “Groucho Mask” or “Groucho Glasses,” designed in the likeness of the caricature played by Julius Henry Marx in the Marx Brothers' films. These comedic films were popular in the 1930s and ‘40s, and the mask has been a mainstay of joke shops since as early as the 1940s.

Other emoji faces in disguise include ðŸ¦¸ Superhero and ðŸ¦¹ Supervillain.
apple_vendor_description: The disguised face emoji on Apple devices presents a whimsical character peeking out from behind a large, dark-rimmed pair of spectacles and a wide, red nose. Its subtle 3D shading and smooth gradients give it a playful, cartoonish feel, while the slightly angled head suggests a mischievous peek. This emoji is perfect for conveying a sense of secrecy, impersonation, or playful deception in your digital conversations on Apple devices.
